titleStmt.title: A message from the spirit of truth, unto the holy seed, who are chosen out of the world, and are lovers, and followers of the light
titleStmt.author: Naylor, James, 1617?-1660.
R. T. (Rebecca Travers), 1609-1688.

notesStmt.note: "To the reader" signed: R.T. [i.e. Rebekah Travers]
